content: This ismy first word game and I must say, I enjoy the variability. It reminds me of the choose-your-own adventure books I used to read.
fun little game! great way to kill time on transit
Game? Simple. Dialog. Funny. Play? Yes.
This was super fun, but the frequency that I came to a dead end on some of the stories is the only real reason I'm uninstalling it. Definitely recommend playing it though.
This is a lot of fun. Give it a try.
really fun game ,but it didnt have much in it
Oddly. Addictive. Fun. Play! Story? Good. Gameplay? Simple. Length? Too short. Liked? Loved.....
Lovely game, with dashes of humour and witty logic. A great experience.
Chromebook support would be nice.

It's different, and for a couple dollars it will bring you 2-4 hours of entertainment. It's interesting to see what happens when you step interactive stories to its care minimum and still have it work. But it gets old really quick. Personally I found the first story the best, the other ones are kind of meh.
surprisingly entertaining one of my new favorite games
Not really my thing I guess. I didn't like the shortness, the stories weren't... that interesting to me. Sorry.

The game is fun and a unique take on an old genre but why on god's earth does such a simple text game heat up my phone so much?! Like I'm not talking warm.. I meant HOT, hotter than most full 3D games. Makes me want to cut my sessions super short which while doable for a game like this.. it's annoying and really something I shouldn't have to worry about for a game like this.
Great little game - a surprising amount of content for the premise and a great sense of humor. Half the fun is finding all the different ways to die.

Very fun! I recommend it to anyone that enjoys text adventure games, although this is a bit of a different one. It's a game you can sink hours into if you want to, or you can pick up and play for a few minutes at a time. Great game, 100% recommend.
It's surprising how much can be conveyed with just a few words. The simple effects along the way are very engaging. One of the most interesting mobile games I've played.
Extremely predictable, refunded after less than 5 minutes.
Nothing but a few words a simple choice and your adventure begins. Love it
simple and many endings!
funniest game I've played in a long time, so many different choices so much left to explore
Hi! I'm a Storyteller and I loved the dinamic... Is there an open platform where I could write some stories like this as well?
very fun and simple
me am blind froom suun
simple, but not shallow. good for when you need to pass short amounts of time.

Very cool throwback and totally unique take on the text adventure genre. My only critique is it sucks having to start from scratch everytime you die. The child one takes much trial and error, and I finally had to take a break from the frustration. It would be nice if there was a checkpoint feature to save your path.
Horribly boring ðŸ˜´
Quick bite sized fun.

Its SO boring!! I like text adventures and I get what they tried to do here summing up everything in three words but the whole time NOTHING is happening! I've played about 20 mins but I was bored by the first 20 seconds. Sorry excuse for entertainment, your games bad and you should feel bad. Please use the 1.79 I wasted on your game for self improvement!
beautifully minimal and very fun to play!

Ok, just got pulled into this game for a few minutes and it's absolutely a blast! Simple interface gives plenty of room for expression and delivers. Honestly I can't wait to have some time to just chill and see where these stories go, but it's already clear that they did an exceptional job. Thanks for the entertainment CMG.
very entertaining simple text game where your choices determine the story. I appreciate the use of humor in what you choose.
Minimalistic twist on a text based adventures. Several paths, most quick and funny, but some are deep and developed. Nice little escape from day to day hustle.
Game. Play. Good. Happy.
Bland not clear on the point.
awesome worth it.
chefs kiss
Small game that is appallingly boring. There are so few choices and they are the same over and over.
very interesting concept, fun and different every time!
so much fun, witty simple humor, lots of replay for different outcomes, lots of achievements to unlock
This game is fun and inventive, giving you plenty of option in play. Each story feels varied and unique in their own way.
really clever and fun
lots of fun endings to explore and fun stories to play. it is so simple and so beautiful
So simple, yet so entertaining. It allows for your imagination to fill in the blanks. Love it.
An excellent game, and a great way of showing how narrative can be put across elegantly in a very minimalist form. Very worth a play both for elongated and shorter experiences!
